function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);
}

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

function resetModalToInitialState(currentMonth, currentDate, currentYear) {
var enableOnlineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineRadio’);
var enableOfflineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineRadio’);
var onlineStoreInputForm = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineInput’);
var offlineStoreInputForm = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineInput’);
var onlineUrl = document.querySelector(‘#onlineUrl’);
var onlinePriceRaw = document.querySelector(‘#onlinePriceRaw’);
var onlineShippingRaw = document.querySelector(‘#onlineShippingRaw’);
var onlineDay = document.querySelector(‘#onlineDay’);
var onlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#onlineMonth’);
var onlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#onlineYear’);
var onlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#onlineCalendar’);

var offlineStoreName = document.querySelector(‘#offlineStoreName’);
var offlineCity = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCity’);
var offlineState = document.querySelector(‘#offlineState’);
var offlinePriceRaw = document.querySelector(‘#offlinePriceRaw’);
var offlineDay = document.querySelector(‘#offlineDay’);
var offlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#offlineMonth’);
var offlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#offlineYear’);
var offlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCalendar’);

var thankYouDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_thank’);
var errorDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_error’);
var submitButton = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_submit’);
var loadingGifDiv = document.querySelector(‘#loading’);

var stateDefaultOption = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultOption’);
var stateDefaultPrompt = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultPrompt’);

if (thankYouDiv) {
thankYouDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (errorDiv) {
errorDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (loadingGifDiv) {
loadingGifDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (submitButton) {
submitButton.style.display = ‘block’;
}
onlineUrl.value = ”;
onlinePriceRaw.value = ”;
onlineShippingRaw.value = ”;
offlineStoreName.value = ”;
offlineCity.value = ”;
offlineState.value = ”;
offlinePriceRaw.value = ”;

stateDefaultOption.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();
stateDefaultPrompt.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();

setInitialStates(
onlineMonth,
currentMonth,
offlineMonth,
onlineDay,
currentDate,
offlineDay,
onlineYear,
currentYear,
offlineYear,
onlineStoreInputForm,
offlineStoreInputForm,
enableOfflineStoreRadio,
enableOnlineStoreRadio,
onlineCalendar,
offlineCalendar
);
}

});

Price: $39.95
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:04:06 UTC – Details)


Control your lights and appliances with a simple tap or by asking Siri. Or effortlessly set up schedules that put your appliances on autopilot, turning your floor lamps, dehumidifier and many other devices on and off independently of your iPhone or internet connection. With HomePod, HomePod mini, or Apple TV as your home hub, you can also access your accessories on the go, control them automatically based on whether somebody is leaving or arriving home, and add automations that work with other HomeKit-enabled accessories. Eve Energy lets you keep watch the energy your accessories are consuming and shows you how much they’re going to cost based on your entered electricity rate. Eve Energy supports Bluetooth and Thread, and joins your Thread network automatically. As a router node, Eve Energy relays other Thread accessories’ data packages and enhances the stability and reach of your smart home. Equipped with Apple HomeKit technology and UL certification, Eve Energy offers outstanding ease of use and advanced security. Eve Energy is quick & easy to set up, and you don’t need a bridge. And the best thing about all Eve accessories is how they protect your privacy: Eve does not harvest your personal data and there is no Eve cloud, so your data won’t get exposed. Local intelligence means all the processing is done locally and Eve accessories communicate directly with your iPhone, iPad, or home hub without any cloud dependency or bridge.
Eve Energy requires iPhone or iPad with the latest version of iOS/iPadOS
Turn lights and appliances on and off via app, Siri or built-in button; Effortlessly set up schedules to automatically switch devices – independently of your iPhone and home network
Control your appliances on the go or based on presence via a home hub (HomePod, HomePod mini, or Apple TV)
Track power consumption and see the projected cost based on your electricity rate
Joins your Thread network automatically (supports Bluetooth and Thread), and as a router node the accessory enhances the stability and reach of your smart home; HomeKit-enabled for unparalleled ease of use and advanced security; get up and running in a flash with quick & easy set up and no need for a bridge or gateway; UL-certified
100% Privacy: No Eve cloud, no registration, no tracking. Local intelligence and direct communication without bridge or cloud dependency.

The Smart Plug & Power Meter is Thread-enabled.


Easy ways to make your home smart.

Turn lights and appliances on and off via app, Siri or built-in button. Or effortlessly set up schedules that put your appliances on autopilot, turning your floor lamps, dehumidifier and many other devices on and off independently of your iPhone or internet connection. With HomePod, HomePod mini, or Apple TV as your home hub, you can also access your accessories on the go, control them automatically based on whether somebody is leaving or arriving home, and add automations that work with other HomeKit-enabled accessories.

Good to know:

  • Track power consumption and see the projected cost based on your electricity rate
  • Quick & easy set up and no need for a bridge or gateway / UL-certified
  • Joins your Thread network automatically, and as a router node the accessory enhances the stability and reach of your smart home / supports Bluetooth and Thread
  • Apple HomeKit-enabled for outstanding ease of use and advanced security
  • 100% Privacy: No Eve cloud, no registration, no tracking. Local intelligence and direct communication without bridge or cloud dependency.

Requirements: iPhone or iPad with the latest version of iOS/iPadOS; Controlling this HomeKit-enabled accessory automatically and away from home requires a HomePod or an Apple TV (4th generation or later) as a home hub

Power: Input / Output: AC 120 V, 60 Hz, max. 15 A / 1,800 W

Compatibility: Type B sockets, Type A & B appliances

Wireless Connection: Bluetooth, Thread

Dimensions: 2.8 x 1.5 x 2.4 in


Talk or tap to control your home.

Already made yourself comfortable? Hands tied? Turn your devices on and off with a simple tap or by asking Siri. You can also control Eve Energy directly via the built-in switch, which you can protect against curious fingers by activating the child lock.

Control your connected devices from anywhere – whether you’re strolling around the block or exploring the world. Your home hub (HomePod, HomePod mini, or Apple TV) will keep you connected to your abode.




Put your appliances on autopilot.

Schedules enable you to automate lights, humidifiers, fans and other vital devices. You can then get on with your business while your accessories get on with theirs – all without the need for a home hub and independently of your iPhone or internet connection.

You could have a floor lamp turn on at sunset even if you’re not at home – that’s not only convenient, but also reassuring.

Automations and HomeKit scenes.

Automations seamlessly connect your HomeKit-enabled accessories. Have a light turn on as soon as the Eve Motion wireless motion sensor detects any movement. Or switch your appliances on and off based on whether someone is leaving or arriving home – and save precious power. As soon as the last person leaves home, all the lights and appliances will turn off automatically.

Combine multiple HomeKit-enabled accessories in a single scene and save yourself the hassle of running to and fro. A “Good Night” scene can turn on your bedside lamps, shut your shades and switch off all the other lights in your home with a single voice command.

Watch those Watts.

Curiosity. Costs. Conservation – reasons to monitor your power consumption and projected cost are aplenty. Eve Energy gives you the insight to embrace yours – and gain a complete overview by entering your electricity rate.

Read more


Robust smart home, with a big future ahead.

Eve Energy supports Bluetooth and Thread, and joins your Thread network automatically. As a router node, Eve Energy relays other Thread accessories’ data packages and enhances the stability and reach of your smart home. Thread is also a pillar of Matter – the smart home standard of the future.

Eve Energy Eve Light Switch Eve Motion Eve Room Eve Door & Window Eve Aqua
Description Smart Plug & Power Meter Connected Wall Switch Wireless Motion Sensor Indoor Air Quality Monitor Wireless Contact Sensor Smart Water Controller
Features Built-in schedules, power meter, onboard power button Capacitive touch panel, status LED, Single-pole & 3-way Indoor/outdoor, infrared sensor with 120º field of view, 30 ft max range, 2-second reaction time, IPX3 water resistance Precision VOC, temperature & humidity sensors, e-ink display, built-in rechargeable battery, aluminum frame Discreet design, included mounting spacers Built-in schedules, auto shut-off, onboard control button, aluminum frame, IPX4 water resistance, UV protection, child lock
Direct Connection (No Bridge Necessary) Switch on/off a lamp, fan, etc. via app or Siri, set schedules Make regular hardwired lights smart, switch on/off via app, Siri or direct touch Trigger HomeKit-enabled accessories & scenes via presence (Apple home hub recommended) View indoor air quality & comfort levels, record measurements Check the open/closed status of a door or window, record activity Control a sprinkler via app or Siri, set schedules, track estimated water usage
With Home Hub (Apple TV or HomePod) Control while away from home, automate Control while away from home, automate Get motion detection notifications while away from home, trigger automations View measurements while away from home, trigger automations Get activity notifications while away from home, trigger automations Water garden while away from home, automate
Works great in scenes & automations with: Eve Motion, Eve Door & Window, Eve Room, Eve Light Strip, Eve Flare, Eve Light Switch Eve Energy, Eve Light Strip, Eve Flare Eve Energy, Eve Light Strip, Eve Flare, Eve Light Switch Eve Energy Eve Energy Eve Weather
Specifications Type B sockets, Type A & B appliances Input: AC 120 V, 50/60 Hz; requires a neutral wire; replaces a single-pole or 3-way switch; only for use with copper / copper clad wire in dry, indoor locations 2 seconds reaction time, field of view: 120, distance: 30 ft. max at 6.5 ft. mounting height, 0°F – 130°F), IPX3 water resistance Operating Range: 32°F – 122°F, 5% – 95% humidity, Accuracy: Typical ± 0.54°F Typical ± 3% humidity, Display: E-ink ~ 200 x 200 pixels Easy DIY installation, Self-adhesive, completely wireless, long lasting battery Thread: ¾ in; Operating Range: Pressure: Min 1 bar / 14.5 psi – Max 5 bar / 72.5 psi, Water Resistance, UV Protection
Power Source Input / Output: AC 120 V, 60 Hz, max. 15 A / 1,800 W Min. 3 W; Max. 1800 W / 15 A (resistive); Max. 600 W / 5 A (incandescent / tungsten) 2x AA Replaceable Batteries Built-in micro USB-rechargeable battery: 6+ weeks 1x ER14250 Replaceable Battery 2x AA Replaceable Batteries
Wireless Connection Bluetooth Low Energy, Thread Bluetooth Low Energy, Thread Bluetooth Low Energy, Thread Bluetooth Low Energy Bluetooth Low Energy, Thread Bluetooth Low Energy, Thread
Requirements iPhone or iPad with the latest version of iOS/iPadOS iPhone or iPad with the latest version of iOS/iPadOS iPhone or iPad with the latest version of iOS/iPadOS iPhone or iPad with the latest version of iOS/iPadOS iPhone or iPad with the latest version of iOS/iPadOS iPhone or iPad with the latest version of iOS/iPadOS

item.title: Automotive Smoke Machine | Built-in Air Motor | EVAP Vacuum Leak Detector Tester | Shop Series Plus | Made in The USA
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) 【 NEW BUILT-IN AIR MOTOR】No need for a separate air supply!【 HIGH PERFORMANCE, PREMIUM BUILD】Made in the USA. Solid Thick Metal Construction for durability. Equipped with our brand new AutoLine Pro Ceramic Smoke Coil that outputs LOTS OF SMOKE and last a Lifetime. (Lifetime Guarantee!)【 DIAGNOSE ALL TYPES OF LEAKS ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $149.99 - $129.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:20:40 UTC – Details)



【 NEW BUILT-IN AIR MOTOR】No need for a separate air supply!
【 HIGH PERFORMANCE, PREMIUM BUILD】Made in the USA. Solid Thick Metal Construction for durability. Equipped with our brand new AutoLine Pro Ceramic Smoke Coil that outputs LOTS OF SMOKE and last a Lifetime. (Lifetime Guarantee!)
【 DIAGNOSE ALL TYPES OF LEAKS WITH ADAPTERS】Consistently smoke test EVAP systems, Vacuum leaks, low pressure Turbo leaks, Intake Manifolds, Cooling / EGR / Exhaust Systems, worn rubber, gaskets, seals, connectors, and more! The tapered smoke injection nozzle fits into virtually all hoses and lines.
【 PRECISE AND SAFE】Engineered 100% safe for all vehicles. Thick Smoke output detects even the smallest leaks. Every unit Is backed by 1 YEAR FULL COVERAGE WARRANTY! AS AN AMERICAN FAMILY BUSINESS, we stand proudly behind our products. If you have any issues, don’t hesitate to contact us directly.
【 HOW DOES IT WORK?】(1) Fill with the included OEM Approved Smoke Fluid. The kit operates with the included OEM Approved Fluid or you may use your own USP Mineral Oil / Baby Oil. (2) Fasten the Power Cable (3) Warm up for 3 minutes and then turn on the Built-In Air Motor. (4) Check for LEAKS with Smoke Detection Technology.

4.5

Product Description

4.5v 4.5v 4.5v 4.5v 4.5v 4.5v

【Attractive Christmas Decor】Our lighted snowman is perfect decoration in Christmas season. With pre-lit lights,the outdoor snowman decor is gorgeous yard art to celebrate your Christmas.
Lighted Pop Up Christmas Snowman: Christmas Penguin with 48 LEDs warm white lights at 3FT high, perfect indoor and outdoor Christmas party supplies, brings stronger feeling of Christmas atmosphere and makes it big and attractive Christmas decorations around!
Built-in LED Lights up the Night: Internal 48 LEDs warm white lights create a glowing nighttime display. Each Unit built-in lighting for a vibrant effect and enhanced nighttime visibility. Illuminate your yard for maximum joy that the whole neighborhood can see and enjoy!
Easy to Install & Storage: No tools or specialized skills are required. Very easy to set up and take down. Just takes few minutes to put them together, using the ground stake to fix firmly if displaying outdoors in fine weather. When not in use, the snowman can be folded up and placed in a box. It takes up no space at all. Please refer to the instructions for detailed installation.
Perfect Christmas Decoration: Great for Christmas Themed Party, Indoor & Outdoor Decorations, or yards Decoration! Add stunning reflective theme for your Christmas celebrations. It is suitable for home, patio, lawn, garden, bistro, pub, cafe, restaurant, shopping center, supermarket, New Year, birthday, gathering, disco ball party, dinner party, evening party and wedding.

Amazfit GTS 4 Mini is an ideal solution for your health and fitness management. Easy health management with 24H Heart Rate, SpO₂ & Stress Monitoring, Sleep Quality tracking, and enabling Test 3 Health Metrics in 1 Tap. Come with 120 sport modes & Smart Recognition of 7 sports to make your exercise at a higher level. Supports 5 satellite positioning systems to help you track your moves with high precision. A fully-optimized battery management system provides up to 15 days of battery life. Make daily life a breeze with a wide selection of helpful features, including Amazon Alexa, text, call & App Notifications, sedentary reminders, SMS & Call Quick Replies, Bluetooth Phone Music Control, Bluetooth Phone Camera Control, and More…Compatible with Android 7.0 and above & IOS 12.0 and above device.
【Position with Precision】Amazfit GTS 4 Mini smart watch supports 5 satellite positioning systems to help you make the most of your journeys into the great outdoors, and uses circularly-polarized antenna technology to improve positioning performance and accuracy..Water resistance depth:50 meters
【Alexa Built-in & Powerful Zepp OS】Easily set an alarm, ask a question, get a translation and more, with the Amazon Alexa feature of the watch. Packed with smooth & low power-consuming Zepp OS, which features over 10 mini apps, including the Home Connect third-party app, to help enhance your daily life.
【Health Made Effortless】Easily test your heart rate, blood-oxygen saturation and stress level simultaneously with a single tap of the smartwatch, for a result in as quick as 45 seconds. Also, this watch provides in-depth monitoring of sleep quality to keep you on top of your health.
【120 plus Sports Modes & Smart Recognition】Walking, running, cycling, yoga, and more. Whichever activity makes you challenge yourself, you’ll likely find a sports mode for it on the fitness tracker watch. And Jump into action quickly with smart recognition of 7 Sports.
【Swim with Confidence】A water-resistance grade of 5 ATM means the smart watch can resist the equivalent of up to 50 meters’ water pressure. And whenever you fancy a trip to the pool or the beach, the watch’s Pool Swimming and Open Water Swimming sports modes can scientifically track your swimming data.
【Long-lasting Endurance】This ultra-compact smartwatch packs a mega-powerful 270 mAh battery, bringing 15 days of endurance on typical usage and up to 45 days of battery life on battery saver mode.



Easily test your heart rate, blood oxygen saturation (SpO₂), and stress level simultaneously, with a single tap of the watch, for a result in as quick as 45 seconds.

And to keep you on top of your game, the watch will send helpful health reminders for:

  • Abnormally High or Low Heart Rates
  • Abnormally Low SpO₂ Levels
  • Abnormally High-Stress Levels
  • Stress-reducing Breathing Exercise



Dare to Dream

Track your sleep quality through the light and deep sleep stages, and even the REM stage – where dreaming is said to occur, as well as monitor sleep breathing quality at night.

PeakBeats Workout Status Algorithm

The watch is equipped with a self-developed motion algorithm, which assesses specialized data such as maximum oxygen uptake (VO2 Max), full recovery time, training load and training effect. Stay informed of performance aspects that can affect recovery, progress and exercise capacity, and track your performance data more professionally.

120+ Sports Modes & Smart Recognition

The watch can track sports data for more than 120 different sports, to satisfy your needs, whatever sport you love.

Also, jump into action quickly with smart recognition of Walking / Indoor walking / Outdoor running / Treadmill / Outdoor cycling / Elliptical / Rowing machine.

Read more




PAI Health Assessment System

A PAI score is calculated by processing data about your heart rate and other complex health information with an algorithm. This single-value score provides a customized health evaluation for each user based on their unique health data, offering everyone a personalized experience.

Strong & Precise Global Positioning

The Amazfit GTS4 Mini supports 5 satellite positioning systems and uses patented circularly-polarized antenna technology to improve positioning performance and accuracy. Track your moves through the great outdoors with high-precision.

Smart AI Assistant

You can talk to Alexa on your Amazfit GTS 4 Mini. Ask questions, get translations, set alarms and timers, create shopping lists, check the weather, control your smart home devices and more.

Read more




1.65″ HD AMOLED Display

The HD full color AMOLED display features a higher resolution than the previous generation with 336×384 pixels and 309 ppi. It will always look stunning and display your content in crystal clear clarity.

Ultra-slim & Light Design

With a light 19.1g weight, a thickness of 9.15mm (without the sensor base), and a skin-friendly silicone strap, the GTS 4 Mini allows you to enjoy the lightness of time.

The ultra-slim and light body is complemented by an elegant metallic middle frame, made of aluminum alloy, for a watch that never compromises in comfort or style.

50+ Watch Faces

The Amazfit GTS 4 Mini can be personalized to reflect your unique character. With over 50 watch faces to choose from, each of which having a matching Always-on Display, you can make sure you’re always in-style and able to see the interface you like. Or, to make the watch face truly yours, upload your own photos to the background and focus on what you care about by customizing your widgets with the custom modular dial. There’s also a selection of 1 animated watch face to give your watch a futuristic and fun look.

Read more

4

Product Description

For over 30 years, Supersonic is a manufacturer in Consumer and Mobile Electronics. Success has been derived from our core mission statement: To provide Design, Value and Quality products, which ensure years of ultimate entertainment experience for our consumers.

We strive to offer innovative and quality products that fit into every individual lifestyle. With collaboration from our partners, suppliers and customers, Supersonic is continuously making an effort to satisfy the consumer’s current electronic needs.

SuperSonic LED Widescreen HDTV SERIES

Enjoy stunning picture quality and feel like your right in the middle of the action with this LED HDTV.

SuperSonic HDTV brings you a crisp 1080p picture quality for stunning detail and contrast. The colors projected from the monitor contains a spectrum of vibrant colors. Enjoy your shows almost anywhere! Our TVs are designed to be perfect for any location, such as your kitchen or desk. It is also the perfect size for any RV owner! Our TVs contain HDMI, USB, and AC/DC ports. This feature allows you to freely use your Firestick or similar hardware to browse thousands of channels and apps such as Netflix, Hulu, HBO, Showtime, and more. SuperSonic HDTV is compatible with Amazon Firestick and many others such as video game consoles. Built-in ports makes this a versatile system. With PC inputs our TV’s allows you to use your TV as a computer monitor. The screen size and resolution make for a great PC experience!

Product Description

Leotachi is a professional manufacturer of waterproof bathroom mirror TVs.

Waterproof Touch Screen Mirror TV for Bathroom

Screen Support 360° Rotation（New upgrade）Lock Screen Function（New upgrade）High-Speed Processor RK3288 (Smooth Operation）Touch Screen and IP68 Waterproof Remote Control (Double Control)Automatic Defogging FunctionIP66 High-grade Waterproof

Upgraded mirror TV

Bright and Clear Screen with 1080p high-definition pixels and 500nits high brightness, built-In 2pcs powerful vibration speakers(10w), Leotachi TV provides high quality vivid pictures and a better viewing experience.

Luxury bathroom mirror tv

When you turn off the switch on the TV, it is a luxurious mirror. You can own a Multifunctional TV and a luxury mirror at the same time.

Multipurpose mirror tv

Leotachi mirror TV has advanced performance, can support watching movies, listening to music, playing games, etc.,

Different Bathroom Mirror TV – 360° rotating

IP66 waterproof 1080P bathroom mirror TV system supports rotating the screen by 360°. We also recommend that you can choose a 360° rotating bracket (Available at Leotachi stores), and you can switch the angle and distance you want at will.

Multiple layers of materials are superimposed to make it waterproof and fog-proof

Package included:

When you receive the goods, please carefully confirm whether it is complete.

1 x 21.5inch Bathroom Mirror waterproof TV 1 x IP68 Waterproof Remote Control(Need extra CR2025 battery)） 1 x Wall Bracket 1 x Installation Manual 1 x DC 12V Adapter

Professional Waterproof Level Mirror TV

A waterproof TV that is safe to use around humid environment. The TV is typically sealed in such a way that they can be splashed, rained on, submerged in water and other liquids and still function.

1. Waterproof Level : IP66 2. Overall size : 515(W)*312(H)*36(D)mm / 23.7 inch 3. Screen size: 476(W)-268(D)mm / 21.5 inch 4. Resolution: 1920*1080 5. Net Weight: 5.5KG 6. Working Temperature: -40 ~76°C 7. Power consumption : 60W (standby≤1W) 8. Speaker Power: 10w*2.

For Women

You can use Leotachi’ TV to watch your favorite movies or short videos.

For Men

You can use Leotachi’TV to watch your favorite competitions or news

For Kids

You can use Leotachi’TV to watch your favorite cartoons or play games

For Family

You can use Leotachi’TV to improve family harmony and get everyone in the family to love bathing!

IMPORTANT NOTICE

· Mirrors Damaged/Chipped on Arrival,No return needed.

· All you need to do is sending us photos.We will provide you with the most satisfactory solution within 24 hours.

· Please check the outer package while receiving, only accept whole package. And please check whether the mirror is intact.、

【Upgraded Smooth Touch Screen System】The mirror TV is a 10-point touch screen technology that supports a variety of gestures, you can also freely choose touch screen or remote control. The system uses a high-speed processor RK3288 – Quad-core ARM Cortex-A17 architecture to ensure smooth operation when using.
【Upgraded Brightness and Volume】Powered with safe low voltage DC 12V adapter, The brightness of 500cd/m2 is brighter than similar products on the market, bringing you different visual effects; in addition, the dual-speaker design allows you to hear clearly in noisy environments; better heat dissipation fast and prolong the service life of the product.
【Multifunctional luxury mirror】 When you turn off the switch on the TV, it is a luxurious mirror. You can own a multifunction TV and a luxury mirror at the same time. Leotachi’s TV has a professional-grade IP66 waterproof rating, and the screen is automatically defogged without additional operation. especially suitable for some wet or extreme places, such as bathroom, shower, kitchen, swimming pool, yacht, sauna, spa, hot tub, steam room, etc.
【Installation and After Sales】 The Leotachi Bathroom TV comes with a wall mount bracket that can be easily installed in a wall recess or fixed to the wall by just one person. leotachi Bathroom TV is professionally certified and we offer a 1 year warranty. Please feel free to contact us for more details, all messages will be answered within 24 hours.

HAOCROWN 32” FULL HD WITH 10-POINT MULTI-TOUCH CAPACITY SCREEN

In combination with the touch screen technology, you can easily browse through all the available options, choose your favorite programs, change the volume and turn the TV on and off with a simple touch of the TV screen. (Only suitable for use in HDMI2 channel)

The touch screen is very sensitive to slight and fast touch. Anti-scratch, not afraid of dust, water, and dirt, suitable for use in harsh environments.

The TV is being used in the shower area for easy accessibility and added safety. Don’t miss out on this amazing opportunity to showcase the latest spa technology and gain full control of your TV viewing experience.

Haocrown 32-inch Touch Screen IP66 Waterproof TV Smart Mirror for Bathroom LED TV Android 11.0 Full-HD Televions

MAIN INFORMATION OF 32 INCH TOUCH-SCREEN MIRROR BATHROOM TV IN HAOCROWN

LED display Size (diagonal): 32 inchesColor Options: MirrorBuilt-in the System (HDMI2 Channel): Android 11.0 (Quad-Core Processor)Control Type: Full Touch screen for 10 Point-Touch Control in smart system (HDMI2 channel)Brightness: 500 cd/m² (Ensure a great viewing experience in the bathroom that is usually well lit)Two installation Mode: Wall-mountable and Flush-mounted（Two Brackets are included in the Package）Speaker: Built-in two 8Ωx5W waterproof speakers / Or support Audio out available for external speakersTV Channel : HDTV,ATSC , Manual and automatic channel searchingDefault Language: English, Multi-lingual choiceRAM&ROM : 8G & 64G (Large memory makes the TV run smoothly and download more software)Resolution : 1920×1080 , 1080P FHD (you will have a clear picture and the image seems bright)Smart TV( HDMI2 Channel) Support: Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, Netflix, Youtube, etc.Support Multiple Modes：TV，HDMI1，HDMI2(Built-in Android 11.0 system, Support 10 Point-Touch Control），Media(USB2.0).

WHY PEOPLE WILL CHOOSE OUR HAOCROWN WATERPROOF BATHROOM TELEVISION?

WHY PEOPLE WILL CHOOSE OUR HAOCROWN WATERPROOF BATHROOM TELEVISION?

IP66 Triple Waterproof Protection

The whole TV housing passed IP66-Waterproof CertifiedWater-resistant, Dust-proof and Anti-fogSuitable for Humid and wet conditions

Luxury magic mirror design

Diamond-grade nano-silver mirror glassThe bathroom television is completely hidden in mirror.Full mirror when TV is off

Stable, Fast 2.4G 5.8G WiFi signalBluetooth 4.2 ,Easily connect to bluetooth devices

Full-Screen 10 Point Touch controlSimple Connect to Wi-Fi, easy access Netflix, YouTube..etc.

Image Feedback from our customers

Better tv than I expected

“”Great tv, i wired it directly to a speaker so I dont know if the sound quality is good, but through an external speaker its perfect.””

Impressive. Great mirror/TV for our bathroom.

“Impressed. When TV is off, looks like a normal mirror in our bathroom. Turn on the TV and the picture shows through really well. Running Android so easy to install apps. All good. Can watch from the bath with no problem. Comes with two ways to install (mounting cage or wall bracket). Good picture and sound. Overall pleased with this set.”

That it works well in the bathroom

“Would have been better if it swivelled but as it is in the bathroom it needs to be waterproof! But in every other respect it works very well and was just what was required!!”

Excellent Product

“Good product build quality, looks great in my bathroom.

Android portion is quite quick, and also can use on its own if you use a Chrome Cast and stream to the device. Adding a speaker definitely improves the sound which is quite ‘tinny’ out of the box.”

PACKAGE INCLUDE：

1 x 32-inch Touchscreen Smart Bathroom TV1 x IP68 Waterproof Remote Control (Need CR2025 battery）1 x Power Adapter and cord1 x Embedded Bracket with screws1 x On-Wall Bracket with screws1 x Installation Manual1 x HDMI Cable

Come included with a Wall-mount and Recess mounting Bracket in the Package

[IP66 100% Waterproof with safety]: Haocrown Waterproof TV is Built to the IP66-Certified Waterproof Standards, the whole machine with triple waterproof treatment, dustproof and anti-fog which can effectively prevent the damage of the TV from flushing. Powered with safe low voltage DC 12V, which design for humid Areas, Suitable for use in bathrooms, shower rooms, saunas, and spas etc. Let You Relax in the Bath and Tune in to Your Favourite TV Shows.
[2-in-1 Vanishing Mirror TV design]: Haocrown 32 inch smart TV is completely embedded within a luxury mirror. A mirror when turned off, but changes into a beautiful showpiece when you want it to. Power-on features enhanced brightness 500 LED screen to ensure excellent bright picture quality in usually well lit. It comes with endless possibilities. It is perfect for Bathrooms, offices, Gyms and many more locations, any space will come alive.
[Smart Android 11.0 System & HDTV Digital Tuner] Comes with the world’s most popular Android 11.0 operating system in HDMI2 channel.Haocrown Bathroom TV provides abundant content,Simply Connect to Wi-Fi or Lan, enjoy such as YouTube, Netflix,etc Entertainment essentials come pre-installed. 8 GB RAM, 64 GB Storage let you feel at ease to download more APP via the Google Play Store. Built-in ATSC tuner, supports digital HDTV programs.

    There are several factors that increase the manufacturing costs.The main points are you safety and making the units waterproof.

    The units muse pass industry Highest IP66 waterproof standards which means great care needs to be taken when manufacturing.

    When the TV is turned OFF, can you see the screen outline within the mirror?

    No – it allowed the TV screen to be totally invisible when turned OFF,

【Awesome Configuration】27-inch screen with 1080p high-definition pixels and high brightness, built-In 2pcs powerful vibration speakers, which you can easily connect Wi-Fi and Bluetooth in HDMI 2 channel, high configuration RAM:4 GB, ROM:64 GB, built-in Android 11.0 system, HD screen provides high quality vivid pictures and a better viewing experience.
【Use scene】As long as the switch of the display is turned off, it is a practical high-definition mirror. Smart mirror IP66 waterproof TV，Especially suitable for some humid or extreme places, such as bathrooms, washing room, show room kitchens, swimming pools, yachts, Sauna, salon, spa, hotel, hot tubs, steam rooms, etc. You can use Smart mirror display with your friends anytime, anywhere.
【Simple Installation】 “In-wall” and “On-wall” options : The waterproof bathroom TV can be fitted either built into the wall recess or secured to the wall itself. The waterproof TVs come included with a wall-mount and recess mounting bracket in the package. Easily to tightly fix the television to the desired spot. Recess Dimensions for In-wall: 656 x 432 x 33mm/25.8″W x 17″H x 1.3″D.
